name: GGJ 2023 - Root Defender
description:
This game has been made during the 2023 Global Game Jam in Geneva (Switzerland).

Root Defender is a Rogue lite. You must destroy ennemies that attack your tree house, in order to let it roots grow again. You go through multiple rooms, aim is to expend the tree house's roots as far as possible.

Credits: Nicolas Lopez (2D/3D Design), Gregory May (Musics), Benjamin Gonvers (Developer), Patrick Sardinha (Developer), Kilian Ruchti (Developers)

Can be played with keyboard (W, A, S, D for movement and Q, E for attacks) or with controller (A, B for attacks).
